item.title: National Science Foundation says it will unfreeze grant money after court order
item.description: While NSF is still reviewing how its grants comply with Trump executive orders, it says it will continue to paying existing grants

item.title: Trump puts Mexico tariffs on hold for 1 month after a call with the Mexican president
item.description: US tariffs on Mexico to be put on hold for month
